fields.name: Sublime Salutations (C1)
fields.value: Within 3s after using Artistic Ingenuity, Kaveh's Dendro RES and Incoming Healing Bonus will be increased by 50% and 25% respectively.

fields.name: Grace of Royal Roads (C2)
fields.value: Kaveh's Normal Attack SPD increases by 15% during Painted Dome.

fields.name: Profferings of Dur Untash (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Painted Dome by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Feast of Apadana (C4)
fields.value: Dendro Cores created from Bloom reactions Kaveh triggers will deal 60% more DMG when they burst.

fields.name: Treasures of Bonkhanak (C5)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Artistic Ingenuity by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Pairidaeza's Dreams (C6)
fields.value: When Kaveh's Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks hit opponents during Painted Dome, they will unleash Pairidaeza's Light upon the opponent's position, dealing 61.8% of Kaveh's ATK as AoE Dendro DMG and causing all Dendro Cores within that AoE to burst. This effect can be triggered once every 3s.
